PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-07662011-06-23,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectScott, The Hon. André F., RELOCATION EXPENSES additional
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. ANDRÉ F. SCOTT, who was required to relocate to Ottawa, Ontario, following his appointment as a Judge of the Federal Court on September 30, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
